paper_abstract: BioShell is a suite of programs performing common tasks accompanying protein structure modeling. BioShell design is based on UNIX shell flexibility and should be used as its extension. Using BioShell various molecular modeling procedures can be integrated in a single pipeline. Availability: BioShell package can be downloaded from its website http://biocomp.chem.uw.edu.pl/BioShell and these pages provide many examples and a detailed documentation for the newest version. Contact: dgront@chem.uw.edu.pl.
paper_title: BioShell - a package of tools for structural biology computations
